name: custom-musicplayer
description:
![image](./assets/images/snapshot.png) ## Table of Content - [Description](#description) - [Features](#features) - [Requirements](#requirements) - [Installation Process](#installation-Process) - [Live Link](#Live-Link) - [Technology Used](#technology-Used) - [Licence](#licence) - [Authors Info](#Authors-Info) ## Description

This is a custom music player where a user is able to play any of ther favorite from anywhere and also the user is able to upload a new song, a user can like a song and also favorite a song
